ComicInfo.Penciller: Adam Pollina,Paul Abrams,Robert Walker,Robert Walker,Paul Abrams
ComicInfo.Summary: If you thought the streets of Hellhole were depressing, wait until you see the horror that transpires among the power brokers who reside within the penthouse towers that cast their shadows over the evil-wracked inner city. It is here that Cabrini and Wilson are led in their hunt for the one-man massacre that's been working his way through the city's drug pipeline. But they may not like what they find...
ComicInfo.Title: Hellhole Three
ComicInfo.Characters: Officer Michael Cabrini,Captain Ma,Officer Thomas Malone,Tami Uttridge
